summary: A modest Neapolitan man meets a young woman with excessive hairiness. He exhibits her at fairs and marries her.It is after marriage that he receives a tempting offer from a French manager.
cast: Ugo Tognazzi|Annie Girardot|Achille Majeroni|Filippo Pompa Marcelli|Ermelinda De Felice|Elvira Paolini|Ugo Rossi|Donna Badoglio|Antonio Altoviti|Jacques Ruet|Tonino Cianci|Vittoria Esposito|Eva Belami|Marco Ferreri
title: Se acab√≥ el negocio
